info.name: Unified Monade Voice API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection combining Campaign Service, Voice Config Server, and Provider Trunk Configs Service APIs

body.raw:
{
  "user_uid": "user_123",
  "name": "Test Campaign",
  "description": "A test campaign for outbound calls",
  "provider": "vobiz",
  "trunk_name": "Vobiz-SIP",
  "max_concurrent": 5,
  "calls_per_second": 1,
  "daily_start_time": "10:00",
  "daily_end_time": "17:00",
  "timezone": "Asia/Kolkata",
  "max_retries": 3
}

request.description: Upload a CSV file containing contact information for a campaign. CSV must contain a 'phone_number' column and can include additional metadata columns.
Get contacts for a campaign with pagination support.
Clear all contacts for a campaign.
Get analytics data for a specific campaign.

Handle call termination notification from agent service. This endpoint is called by agents when calls end, allowing the campaign service to decrease concurrency counters, update call statistics, and process the next call in queue.
Health check for termination notification endpoint.
Health check endpoint to verify the service is running and accessible.
Ready check endpoint to verify the service is ready to handle requests and database connection is established.
Create a new user account. This automatically generates an API key for the user. Returns user details and the generated API key.
Retrieve details of a specific user by their user_uid.
Update user details including name, email, and available credits. Only provided fields will be updated.
Delete a user account and all associated data. This is a permanent operation.
Retrieve all assistants associated with a specific user.
Retrieve a user's user_uid by their email address. Only returns the user_uid field.
Top up both total_credits and available_credits for a user by adding the specified amount to both fields. The amount must be greater than 0.
Generate a new API key for a specific user. The API key format is 'monade_{uuid}'.
Retrieve all API keys associated with a specific user.
Delete a specific API key by its ID.
Validate an API key and retrieve associated user information. Returns user ID, email, name, and credits.
Retrieve the current available credit balance for a specific user.
Add credits to a user's account. This increases both available_credits and total_credits. Amount must be positive.
Remove credits from a user's account. This only decreases available_credits, not total_credits. Amount must be positive. User must have sufficient available credits.
Directly update a user's available credits to a specific amount. This is typically used by the billing service to sync the final balance from Redis to the database.
Retrieve all assistants in the system.
Retrieve a specific assistant by their phone number.
Retrieve a specific assistant by their ID.
Retrieve all assistants associated with a specific user by their user ID.

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Customer Support Assistant",
  "phoneNumber": "+12345678901",
  "description": "An assistant for customer support",
  "model": "gpt-4",
  "provider": "openai",
  "voice": "nova",
  "costPerMin": 0.1,
  "latencyMs": 200,
  "tags": ["support", "customer-service"],
  "user_uid": "{{user_uid}}",
  "emailSubject": "Customer Inquiry",
  "emailBody": "A customer has reached out with an inquiry.",
  "from": "support@example.com",
  "attachments": [],
  "personalisation": false,
  "flowJson": null
}

request.description: Create a new assistant. The user_uid is required to associate the assistant with a specific user. Phone number must be unique across all assistants.

Update an existing assistant. Only provided fields will be updated. Can update name, phone number (must remain unique), description, model, provider, voice, costPerMin, latencyMs, tags, knowledgeBase, and email/workflow fields.
Delete an assistant by its ID.
Create a new knowledge base by uploading text content. The content will be stored in GCP Cloud Storage and a unique URL will be generated. Requires user_uid to associate with a specific user.

item.name: Create Knowledge Base from Base64 File

request.description: Create a new knowledge base by uploading a base64 encoded file. The file will be stored in GCP Cloud Storage and a unique URL will be generated. Requires user_uid to associate with a specific user.
Retrieve all knowledge bases in the system with associated user information.
Retrieve all knowledge bases associated with a specific user.
Retrieve a specific knowledge base by its ID with associated user information.
Delete a knowledge base by its ID. This will also delete the corresponding file from GCP Cloud Storage.

Create a new transcript record in the database. This is typically called by the agent after a call ends to store the GCS URL for the transcript. Requires user_uid, transcript_url, phone_number, and call_id.
Retrieve all transcripts associated with a specific user, ordered by creation date (most recent first). Requires a valid user_uid parameter.
Create a new campaign. Requires user_uid, name, provider, and trunk_name.
Retrieve details of a specific campaign by its ID.
Retrieve all campaigns associated with a specific user, optionally filtered by status.
Update campaign details. Only provided fields will be updated.
Delete a campaign by its ID.
Start a campaign that is in 'pending' status.
Pause an active campaign.
Stop a campaign and mark it as completed.
Retrieve statistical information about a specific campaign.

body.raw:
{
  "call_id": "call_123456789",
  "user_uid": "{{user_uid}}",
  "analytics": {
    "verdict": "SUCCESS",
    "confidence_score": 95,
    "summary": "Call was successful and resulted in positive outcome",
    "key_discoveries": [
      "Customer expressed interest in product",
      "Scheduled follow-up meeting"
    ],
    "call_quality": "HIGH",
    "use_case": "SALES"
  },
  "transcript_url": "https://storage.googleapis.com/bucket/transcript.jsonl",
  "phone_number": "+1234567890",
  "campaign_id": "campaign_123"
}

request.description: Submit new analytics data for a call. This endpoint is typically called by the post-processing pipeline after analyzing a transcript. Requires call_id, user_uid, analytics object, transcript_url, and phone_number.
Retrieve all analytics records for a specific user. Requires user_uid as a query parameter.
Retrieve analytics data for a specific call by its call_id.

item.name: Get User Analytics by User ID

request.description: Retrieve all analytics records for a specific user by their user_uid.
Retrieve analytics data for a specific user's campaign. Requires both user_uid and campaign_id.
Get analytical statistics for a specific user, including total calls, verdict distribution, average confidence score, and call quality distribution.
Health check endpoint to verify the service is running and accessible.
Retrieve all configured SIP trunks in the system.
Create a new SIP trunk with the provided configuration. Returns the created trunk details.
Retrieve details of a specific SIP trunk by its ID.
Update an existing SIP trunk with the provided configuration. This replaces the existing trunk entirely.
Delete a SIP trunk by its ID. This is a permanent operation.
Initiate an outbound SIP call using an existing trunk. Specify the target phone number and either trunk_id or trunk_name to select which trunk to use for the call.

exec: // Pre-request script can be added here if needed
// Test script can be added here if needed
